original_text:
“To the angel of the church in Thyatira write:
These are the words of the Son of God, whose eyes are like blazing fire and whose feet are like burnished bronze.
korean_text: 두아디라 교회의 사자에게 편지하라 그 눈이 불꽃 같고 그 발이 빛난 주석과 같은 하나님의 아들이 이르시되

sentences.original_text: To the angel of the church in Thyatira write:
These are the words of the Son of God
whose eyes are like blazing fire
and whose feet are like burnished bronze.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 발은 광택 난 놋과 같으니라.
